CustomField.formula: IF( AND( TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName )="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c )= "Individual"),"14000", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c)= "Foundation"),"14100", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c)= "Corporate"),"14300", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c)= "Other Institutional Giving"),"14220", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c)= "Government"),"14200", IF( AND( TEXT(Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.StageName)="Received as Conditional Pledge", TEXT( Pledge_Installment_Payment__r.npe01__Opportunity__r.Transaction_Type__c)= "Government Contract"),"14300",null))))))
CustomField.label: Receivable Natural Account
